com.tozny.e3db

Class CipherWithNonce

  • Object
    • com.tozny.e3db.CipherWithNonce

  • public class CipherWithNonce
extends Object
    Holds an encrypted message with the nonce value used during encryption.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CipherWithNonce(byte[] cipher, byte[] nonce)
      Create a container holding an encrypted message and the nonce used during encryption.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CipherWithNonce decode(String message)
      Decode a string (in the same format as given by toMessage()) into an encrypted message and an associated nonce.
      byte[] getCipher()
      Get the encrypted message.
      byte[] getNonce()
      Get the nonce used during encryption of the message.
      String toMessage()
      Convert the encrypted message and its nonce to a string with the format MESSAGE64.NONCE64, where MESSAGE64 is a Base64URL-encoded representation of the encrypted message, and NONCE64 is a Base64URL-encoded representation of the nonce.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CipherWithNonce

        public CipherWithNonce(byte[] cipher,
                       byte[] nonce)
        Create a container holding an encrypted message and the nonce used during encryption.
        Parameters:
        cipher - cipher.
        nonce - nonce.

    • Method Detail

      • getCipher

        public byte[] getCipher()
        Get the encrypted message.
        Returns:
        cipher.

      • getNonce

        public byte[] getNonce()
        Get the nonce used during encryption of the message.
        Returns:
        nonce.

      • toMessage

        public String toMessage()
        Convert the encrypted message and its nonce to a string with the format MESSAGE64.NONCE64, where MESSAGE64 is a Base64URL-encoded representation of the encrypted message, and NONCE64 is a Base64URL-encoded representation of the nonce.
        Returns:
        The encoded message and its nonce.

      • decode

        public static CipherWithNonce decode(String message)
        Decode a string (in the same format as given by toMessage()) into an encrypted message and an associated nonce.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to decode.
        Returns:
        The encrypted message and its nonce.
